about_the_game:
Hexa World is a game that allows users to create content themselves through 360 Hexastudio authoring tools based on 3D voxels.

 

Create the buildings, cafes, shopping malls, and more you want and create a city with your friends!

 

Simultaneous multiplayer metaverse

Hexa World, which plays its own role and builds a common metaverse ecosystem like the real world!

Communicate with users and expect the impact of events in the metaverse space on the real world!

 

Avatar that I can choose as I want

HexaWorld offers 16 different avatars, including two men and women, and it comes with cute characters tailored to your age group. Feel free to customize your skin color, hair, clothing, and more to express your own avatar!

 

Possessing transportation

You can explore the city by owning a variety of vehicles at Hexa World. Fly in the sky, tour the city, and yacht around the Han River

 

A mini game that you enjoy as a creative work

Make fun installations using 360 Hexastudio and enjoy mini-games with friends. Experience various experiences with friends through the joint metaverse experience of creating new content through various games such as basketball courts and rides
